amendment.description: An amendment numbered 88 printed in Part A of House Report 115-650 to require the FAA to develop global-scale probabilistic convection guidance capability so that aircraft can avoid encounters with convection that causes turbulence.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A022) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A022) offered by Ms. Meng.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A022) Failed by voice vote.
